context: Broadcom Inc. is a semiconductor and infrastructure software conglomerate focused on semiconductors, networking, storage, and enterprise software. Broadband and networking chip leader. Cable modems and set-top boxes.

competitors.name: Texas Instruments
competitors.notes: Major semiconductor company competing in DSP and communications chips
